title: Lettering Class at City College starts 8/16/06
content:
Hi Folks,

I am happy to report that I have a Lettering class starting up soon. We did this last year and it was _fun_!

**GRPH 151 Lettering and Type**  
Wednesdays: 1:00–5:00pm  
CCSF Ocean Campus: 50 Phelan Ave., Health Center 207  
8-week course: August 16–October 4  
CRN 76937

Here is a [gallery](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171422/http:/www.ccsf.edu/Departments/Graphic_Communications/Gallery/Student/Lettering_Type/Lettering_Type.htm) of last year's student work, and here is the [catalog entry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171422/http:/www.ccsf.edu/Catalog/Art/grphcors.html#GRPH%20151) for a formal description (ignore the pre-requisite).

All that entry requires is enrolling at [City College](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171422/http:/www.ccsf.edu/Offices/Matriculation/step1.htm). Everything else we can take care of on the first day of class.

BTW, it's a one-unit class, making it a whopping **$26**!

Feel free to email me with questions,

Amy Conger  
 [aconger@ccsf.edu](mailto:aconger@ccsf.edu)  
 [ccsf.edu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171422/http:/fog.ccsf.cc.ca.us/~aconger/): my academic web site  
 [abecedarienne.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171422/http:/www.abecedarienne.com/): my fonts and art web site
author: abecedarienne

comments.content: This looks brilliant, is there a deadline to enroll by apart from the first day of classes?
Oh, I just noticed how old this is. Dang!
